original_title: 性の知識がない家出少女の手コキでサプライズ男潮！おしっこされたと勘違いして逆襲聖水スプラッシュ倍返し
overview: This guy finds Rara Kudo in the street alone and discovers she ran away from home: He offers helps and brings her home.  She was so thankful for the help that insisted in giving him a freebie handjob, which sparked a series of happenings.
title: Surprise Male Ejaculation From Handjob of Runaway Without Knowledge Of Sex! Thinking She Had Been Peed On She Takes Revenge For Double Splash. Rara Kudo.
